settings.title: Our mission is to make healthy habits accessible.
Slideshow
settings.subheading: Use this section to make a bold statement

settings.title: Optimal nutrition
settings.sub_headline: We prioritize whole-body health, working alongside doctors and nutritionists to formulate blends with targeted benefits.

settings.title: Seriously delicious
settings.sub_headline: You can always count on balanced flavor and smooth texture courtesy of expert flavor developers that craft each blend.

settings.title: Maximum freshness
settings.sub_headline: We freeze-dry organic produce harvested at peak ripeness to maintain essential nutrients and delicious, fresh flavors.

settings.title: Farm to pod produce
settings.sub_headline: Sustainability is at the forefront of our mission—from eco-friendly farms to biodegradable pods and a reusable blender.

settings.main_subhead: We believe in a world where healthier ways are delicious and sustainable. Derived from the Latin word for the Roman god of healing, "Vejo" means providing the fuel to attain peak health. Our products are backed by science, designed for convenience, and thoughtfully made with a greener planet in mind.

settings.subheading: Gute Ernährung kann so einfach sein. Ein Mixer. Eine Kapsel. 30 Sekunden.

settings.title: Thoughtful by design
settings.sub_headline: Our Vejo blenders underwent rigorous testing to ensure a lightweight but powerful blender with long-lasting battery life

settings.title: Perfectly portable
settings.sub_headline: We designed the solution for convenience healthy habits—Vejo is TSA approved and ready to go wherever the day takes you.

settings.title: Reorder conveniently
settings.sub_headline: Need more blends? Order from your desktop or portable device. Need help? Our Vejo experts are a chat away!

settings.title: Sustainably durable
settings.sub_headline: With a stainless steel body and durable composite blade, Vejo is equipped for the long haul. 100% BPA-free and food safe.

settings.main_subhead: We set out to create a portable blender that provides easy access to healthy choices on-the-go. The result is our lightweight but durable Vejo blender that reduces the need for single-use plastics while holding enough power for an entire week of blending—no mess, less stress, and more convenience.

settings.subheading:
"Vejo was born in 2015 after a quest to improve my health and nutrition left me feeling defeated. I scoured endless platforms to find the key to a well-rounded diet and lifestyle but came up with conflicting information. At that moment, I saw an opportunity to combine the knowledge of doctors and nutritionists with the need for accessible nutrition for the masses. Our company mission included no compromises, providing olympian-level nutrition, innovative technology, and environmentally conscious ways. I invite you to join us in creating a healthier, happier world."

– Christoph Bertsch
